DOC.brief_summary: The aim study describe pulmonary hemodynamic evolution rest short constant load exercise 4 condition : - normoxia - hypoxia - hypercapnia - association hypoxia hypercapnia
DOC.brief_title: Effects O2 and/or CO2 Inhalation Rest Exercise Pulmonary Hemodynamic
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : healthy male exercise capacity 100 130 % theorical value Exclusion criterion : smoker headache impossibility perform exercise test tricuspid regurgitation echocardiography
